plugins.name: Auto image
plugins.description: Allows for inserting images simply by pasting a URL to the image into the content. Turns the pasted URL into an image on the go.

plugins.name: Image
plugins.description: Enables support for image handling. Note: The image feature is introduced in a granular form, implemented by separate plugins responsible for such aspects as image caption, toolbar, resize, upload or styles.

plugins.name: Image caption
plugins.description: Allows for adding captions to images to give additional context.

plugins.name: Image resize
plugins.description: Allows for resizing images using handles.

plugins.name: Image style
plugins.description: Allows for using predefined, configurable styles to display the images, for example, as a full width image or side image.

htmlOutput._comment: The plugin can be configured to set any class names on the `<figure>` element.

plugins.name: Image toolbar
plugins.description: Introduces a contextual toolbar for images. It appears when an image is selected and can be configured to contain buttons for features such as the text alternative or image styles.

plugins.name: Image upload
plugins.description: Allows for pasting images from clipboard, dragging and dropping images, selecting them through a file system dialog or from a media management tool. You need to set this plugin up with an official or custom upload adapter.

plugins.name: Image insert
plugins.description: Allows for inserting images via source URL
